author: Reuters Editorial
title: Box Inc reports 24.3 percent rise in quarterly revenue
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Box Inc reported a 24.3 percent rise in fourth-quarter revenue as the cloud storage provider signed up more businesses to its service.
The companyâ€™s net loss narrowed to $32.7 million, or 24 cents per share, in the quarter ended Jan. 31 from $36.9 million, or 28 cents per share, a year earlier.
Redwood City, California-based Box said its revenue rose to $136.7 million from $109.9 million. (Reporting by Arjun Panchadar and Shariq Khan in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel)
